description: These weather resistant leather boots combine an outdoor sensibility with a feminine look. The Aspina Boots have a soft nubuck and suede upper with a HydroMax® weather repellent finish. PU-injected midsoles provide reliable, long-lasting support and a lightweight rubber outsole provides the grip and cushioning you need for all-weather pavement pounding.Nubuck, suede and mesh upper.HydroMax® weather repellent finish helps keep your boots looking great for longer.FluidForm™ direct injection process uses fluid materials over an anatomic last to create incredibly comfortable footwear.Midsole is injected with polyurethane foam for added support and resilience.Receptor® rubber outsole provides added traction.
name: Ecco Aspina Boots - Women's
